title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Mobile Math Learning Design in Real-Life Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (measurement, geometry, statistics) and proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-life problems through mathematical modeling using field data.
Learners can design accurate data collection and analysis processes using mobile devices and measurement tools.
Learners can share mathematical problem-solving strategies with peers and engage in social discussions through collaborative tools.
Learners can compare digital/analog measurement results and explain error analysis and verification procedures.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
